ActJudges Act
SubjectBibiane Bernard ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. J.C. Bruno Bernard
PrecisGranting of an annuity to BIBIANE BERNARD, widow of the Hon. J.C. Bruno Bernard, a Puisne Judge of the Superior Court for the District of Quebec in the Province of Quebec, effective December 7, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
